::Killlfest::

Killfest laughs, his optics clearing and letting him see the holograms 
of Angel Prime.

"Idiot..." He mutters under his breath, seeing Angel Prime's shield. 
His scanners lock onto it, and Killfest follows after Angel Prime, 
firing two more signature-seeking missiles at the Maximal. He aims his 
EMP rifle, firing off two bla
